actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend section 208 of the Public Health Service Act to provide pay incentives for personnel serving in remote and isolated areas.

summary.text: Provides, under the Public Health Service Act, for pay incentives not in excess of 15 percent of basic pay for personnel serving in remote and isolated areas. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 210)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 208 of the Public Health Service Act to provide pay incentives for personnel serving in remote and isolated areas.
